title: History of Straws: From Invention to Regulation
body: July 2018 Seattle's first in the nation plastic straw ban goes into effect.. July 2018 Starbucks announces it plans to eliminate plastic straws from all global locations by 2020.. September 2018 McDonald's announces it will replace single-use plastic straws with paper-based alternatives in all stores across UK and Ireland.The chain uses 1.8M straws per day in the UK.
